project.name: yocto-mailer
project.description: Mailer utility for yocto core stack based on nodemailer

Mailer.name: Mailer
Mailer.description:
Yocto Mailer

This module manage your own mailer

This module his a wrapper of nodemailer for node js package

For more details on used dependencies read links below :
- yocto-logger : git+ssh://lab.yocto.digital:yocto-node-modules/yocto-utils.git
- LodAsh : https://lodash.com/
- joi : https://github.com/hapijs/joi
- nodemailer : https://github.com/andris9/Nodemailer
- nodemailer-smtp-transport : https://github.com/andris9/nodemailer-smtp-transport
Mailer.author: : CÃ©dric BALARD <cedric@yocto.re>

classitems.description: Structure of the object that contains all mail options
classitems.name: mailOptions

classitems.description:
Add a new recipient or an array of recipient
This will remove all previous recipient
classitems.name: addRecipient

params.name: dest
params.description: if it's a string it's contains a email of recepients else if it's an array it contains an array of string (email)

classitems.description:
Set the smtp configuration
Before set the configuration we check with Joi all parameters it's correct
If is correct we set configuration, otherwise no
classitems.name: setConfigSMTP

classitems.description:
Set the expeditor
This param is save in memory
classitems.name: setExpeditor

classitems.description:
Add a new CC recipient or an array of CC recipient
This will remove all previous CC recipient
classitems.name: addCC

params.name: cc
params.description: if it's a string it's contains a email of ccrecepients else if it's an array it contains an array of string (cc email)

classitems.description:
Add a new BCC (CCI) recipient or an array of BCC recipient
This will remove all previous BCC recipient
classitems.name: addBCC

params.name: bcc
params.description: if it's a string it's contains a email of ccrecepients else if it's an array it contains an array of string (bcc email)

classitems.description:
Send the mail with all parameters ( from, to, cc , bcc)
After the mail was send this paramater will be remove : to, cc, bcc, subject, message
classitems.name: send

params.name: callback
params.description: on optional callback, If is not specied a default callback will be execute

classitems.description: Delete mail otpions : to, cc, bcc, subject, message (html)
classitems.name: deleteMailOptions

classitems.description: Export current Mailer to use it on node

warnings.message:
Missing item type
Export current Mailer to use it on node
